title: The Dennis Prager Radio Show JULY-29-2014 TUES
description:
The Dennis Prager Radio Show JULY-29-2014 TUES


Dennis Prager Radio Show
Prager 20140729  3 Ultimate Issues Hour: Raised with Religion

Prager H3: Should non-religious parents raise a religious child?  
   
      When done right, religion can improve a childÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life;
      why not expose your child to the benefits of a religious upbringing?
      Even atheists should be biblically literate.
      Without God, objective morality cannot exist.


 It is a duty for parents to protect children from a nihilistic
      and meaningless existence. 


          Callers share their experiences with religious values.





Prager 20140729  2 The Price of Freedom

Prager H2: The Left insists on eliminating national and religious     
   identities in America, and their effort is succeeding.
   Could this be a result of liberal universities?
   The purpose for coming to America is not only the 
    opportunity and freedom she provides; 
                        it is to become American. 
   Also, should Russians believe claims about current atrocities 
           in the Ukraine? 
   Vladimir Putin may be writing his own history. 
    Is left-wing American media guilty of a similar crime?


Prager 20140729  1 Unhappy Union

Prager H1: Dennis talks to Anton La Guardia, who, 
     along with John Peet, co-wrote the new book, 
      Unhappy Union: How the euro crisis Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and Europe Ã¢â‚¬â€œ can be fixed.

      La Guardia discusses how the attack on flight MH17 
       will affect RussiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s relationship with the European Union,
        as well as anti-western attitudes within the country.
      Also, who is the greatest economic power in Europe?
       What is the prognosis for Greece, 
        and should they stay on the Euro? 
    
      Will Scotland vote to separate from the UK?
